original_title: KDU and Turkish Space Agency to sign MoU
original_body_lines: The Cabinet of Ministers has given its approval to sign a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) between General Sir John Kotelawala Defence University (KDU) and the Turkish Space Agency.
President Ranil Wickremesinghe, in his capacity as the Defence Minister, has proposed that the relevant MoU be inked for resource development cooperation.
This agreement is expected to enable the KDU students to participate as trainees in the International Internship Program of the Turkish Space Agency and gain many other benefits.
